cluster.name: AdministratorCommissioning
cluster.description: Commands to trigger a Node to allow a new Administrator to commission it.

command.name: OpenCommissioningWindow
command.description: This command is used by a current Administrator to instruct a Node to go into commissioning mode using enhanced commissioning method.

command.name: OpenBasicCommissioningWindow
command.description: This command is used by a current Administrator to instruct a Node to go into commissioning mode using basic commissioning method, if the node supports it.

command.name: RevokeCommissioning
command.description: This command is used by a current Administrator to instruct a Node to revoke any active Open Commissioning Window or Open Basic Commissioning Window command.
